# topBar

**Type Property**

Top bar of a tab view.

## Declaration

```swift
static let topBar: TabBarPlacement
```

## Discussion

A tab bar can display as the top bar in [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/TabViewStyle/tabBarOnly] on iPad and macOS, or [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/TabViewStyle/sidebarAdaptable] on iPad.
title: topBar
